    • selectAppointment

      public void selectAppointment(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Mouse function that labels the selected row within the appointments table as the 'selectedAppointment'.

    • toAddAppointment

      public void toAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user to the 'addAppointment' page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toModifyAppointment

      public void toModifyAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Button function that redirects the user to the 'modifyAppointment' page. Will populate the modifyAppointment page with the data for the selectedAppointment, or if one isn't currently selected it will generate an error alert.

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Button function that deletes the selectedAppointment after confirming the selection with a confirmation alert. Generates an error alert if no appointment is currently selected.

    • toViewAll

      public void toViewAll(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Populates the appointments tableView with all appointments related to the currently logged in user. Is the default view when the appointments screen is initially loaded.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toMonthlyView

      public void toMonthlyView(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Populates the appointments tableView with all appointments related to the currently logged in user that start during the coming month. Is selected when the user selects the monthlyView radio button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toWeeklyView

      public void toWeeklyView(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Populates the appointments tableView with all appointments related to the currently logged in user that start during the coming week. Is selected when the user selects the weeklyView radio button.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • searchAppointments

      public void searchAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Populates the appointments tableView with all appointments related to the currently logged in user that match the search criteria. When the user selects the search button, the program parses through the database and returns all appointments that match the search criteria. Appointments in the database must match by appointmentID, title, description, location or type, as indicated by the prompt text in the search bar.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toReports

      public void toReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user back to the 'reports' page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toCustomers

      public void toCustomers(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user back to the 'customers' page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • closeApplication

      public void closeApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Button function that closes the application after a confirmation alert.
